title: Tamil Nadu finance minister Palanivel Thiagarajan presents budget for 2022-23 - Hindustan Times
content: Tamil Nadu finance minister Palanivel Thiagarajan presents budget for 2022-23  Hindustan Times
description: Addressing the Assembly, Thiagarajan also spoke about the negative impact of Covid-19 and floods in the state, as well as unfortunate side-effects of restricions - like lockdowns - taken by the MK Stalin government to combat these crises.
